name: Parallel Parking
description: Park between two vehicles on the right-hand side without touching the curb.
steps: Align rear bumpers, signal right, and check mirrors plus blind spot.
Reverse slowly while steering fully toward the curb when the rear wheel reaches the other vehicle's bumper.
Counter-steer to straighten and end parallel within 30 cm of the curb.

name: Three-Point Turn (Wendeanlage)
description: Turn around safely in a narrow residential street.
steps: Signal left, move close to left curb, and stop when front wheels reach edge.
Reverse with observation, steering fully right without mounting the curb.
Straighten vehicle and drive off in new direction, re-checking mirrors.

name: Controlled Emergency Brake
description: Simulate an emergency stop while maintaining steering control.
steps: On command, brake firmly and clutch simultaneously without locking wheels.
Secure vehicle (handbrake if requested), check mirrors, and move off safely.

name: Incline Start
description: Start smoothly on an incline without rolling backwards.
steps: Set handbrake, engage first gear, and apply slight throttle.
Balance clutch bite before releasing handbrake to avoid roll-back.
Check mirrors and blind spot, then merge back into traffic decisively.

name: Controlled Stop & Safety Check
description: Perform a safe, examiner-requested stop and restart.
steps: Choose a straight, safe shoulder; mirror-signal-manoeuvre.
Before moving off, check mirrors, blind spot, signal, and rejoin traffic.
